test.name: Search product and check products are matching or not

kw.name: Open browser and install add_extension to block the ads
kw.doc: Since we are automating a website which is published in the internet, and the website contains ads like in any normal websites. The ads blocks the flow of automation. So to avoid this, a browser extension is used which blocks the ads in the website. crx file is used here that installs the adblock extension on every browser opened.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//*[contains(text(),'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers')]' is displayed.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${text} = Sleeves Top and Short - Blue & Pink

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${text1} = Sleeves Top and Short - Blue & Pink

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: text ss2: Sleeves Top and Short - Blue & Pink

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

test.doc: Opens the website, open search page and search for product verify all product details for now it is hard coded data compared with the product details
